refnamediv.refpurpose: Reads the HTTP body from the client HTTP connection and returns it as a string.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para:
This function reads the HTTP body from the client HTTP connection and returns it as a string output. This is suitable for processing POST requests with bodies encoded differently than multipart/*
and application/x-www-form-urlencoded
as in SOAP requests where the POST body is encoded as text/xml
).

example.title: Reading a HTTP request entity body
example.para: Suppose we have the following HTTP request
The following VSP page will read the content and return an XML document back to the browser.
example.screen:
<?vsp
declare ses any;
ses := http_body_read ();
http_header ('Content-Type: text/xml\r\n');
http (string_output_string (ses));
?>
